page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF PIPPA
page.content: I am a girl of eleven years old. I live in Masham. My name is Pippa Bramley. I have light brown hair. I have two sisters and one brother. I get up every morning at 8.00.a.m.and set off for school at about 8.45.a.m. The bell for us to line up in the playground goes at 9.00.a.m. A teacher comes to send us in. Mr. Morgan calls the register to see if we are all here. Now we go into hymn practise with Miss Hird and all have a good sing. After hymn practise we do our maths and topic work until 12.00.p.m. After dinner I go into the library until 1.15.p.m. After afternoon register we do science or language. Now we have a playtime.Once play has finished we listen to a story until 3.30.p.m. Sometimes there is a club to go to after school like Chess Club.
